message: Dear customer, your eSewa account has been locked. Please share OTP code to unlock. Call 9801234567 immediately.
Urgent! Your Khalti wallet will be blocked. Share the verification code we sent to verify your identity.
Tapaiko eSewa account ma suspicious activity detect bhayo. OTP code pathau natra account band huncha.
Your NIC Asia bank account needs verification. Reply with OTP immediately.
Ma NIC Asia bank bata call gareko. Tapaiko account hacked bhayo. OTP code dinu hos.
Congratulations! You're selected for home-based data entry job. Salary Rs.45000/month. Send Rs.2000 registration fee to 9823456789.
Badhai chha! Tapaile Ncell lucky draw ma Rs.1 lakh jitnu bhayo. Prize claim garna 9834567890 ma contact gara.
This is Nabil Bank security team. Suspicious transaction detected. Confirm by sharing OTP sent to your phone.
eSewa verification failed. Click link: bit.ly/esewa-verify and enter OTP to reactivate your wallet.
Online survey job - earn Rs.500 per survey. First complete registration by paying Rs.1500 to get started.
You won iPhone 14 Pro in Daraz anniversary contest. Pay Rs.5000 delivery charge to claim prize.
Security alert! Someone tried to login to your Khalti. Share OTP code received to block unauthorized access.
Global IME Bank security notice. Your debit card will expire today. Call 9890123456 with OTP to renew.
eSewa payment failed. Your wallet is temporarily locked. Verify with OTP to unlock and complete payment.
Bank verification required. Do not share this OTP with anyone. Reply with code to confirm it's you.
Your parcel is stuck at customs. Pay Rs.3500 clearance fee to 9823456789 to receive your package.
KBC lottery winner! Amitabh Bachchan le tapaiko number select gareko. Rs.25 lakh prize paaunu chha bhane call gara.
Part-time work from home. Company provides laptop and training. Send Rs.5000 security deposit to confirm your seat.
Prabhu Bank Alert: Unusual activity detected on your account ending 4521. Verify with OTP or account will be frozen.
Khalti security update required. Enter the 6-digit code we sent to update your security settings.
Dear user, someone is trying to withdraw Rs.15000 from your eSewa. Share OTP to cancel this transaction.
Congratulations! Your mobile number selected in Google lucky draw. Claim Rs.5.5 lakh prize. Processing fee Rs.8000.
Income tax refund of Rs.12450 pending. Verify bank details and OTP to receive refund in 24 hours.
Amazon hiring for product review job. Earn Rs.800 per review. Registration fee Rs.2500. Limited seats available.
Everest Bank fraud alert. Transaction of Rs.25000 pending approval. Share OTP within 30 mins to cancel.
IME Pay account login from new device detected. If this wasn't you, share OTP to secure your account.
Tapaiko Khalti wallet ma Rs.50000 add bhayo. Yedi timi le gareko haina bhane OTP code pathau.
Flipkart anniversary bumper prize. You won laptop and Rs.75000 cash. Shipping charge Rs.4500 required.
Your electricity bill payment failed. Reconnection charge Rs.2000. Pay to 9806666666 to avoid disconnection.
Government job quota seat available. Direct appointment without exam. Processing fee Rs.15000. Contact immediately.
NMB Bank customer care. Your ATM card is blocked due to multiple wrong PIN attempts. Share OTP to unblock.
ConnectIPS verification needed. Your banking apps will stop working. Confirm OTP to continue services.
eSewa wallet limit exceeded. Upgrade to premium account by verifying OTP. Instant upgrade available.
Sanima Bank alert: Your account will be deactivated due to KYC update pending. Verify OTP urgently.
Netflix subscription expired. Renew now to continue watching. Payment link sent. Confirm with OTP code.
Tiktok lucky user! Tapaile Rs.2 lakh jitnu bhayo. Prize claim form fill gara. Processing Rs.6000.
Medical coding work from home. US company. Salary $800/month. Training fee Rs.8000. Start earning in 1 week.
Fonepay security upgrade mandatory. All users must verify OTP by tonight or services will be suspended.
Machhapuchhre Bank notification: Large transaction pending. Confirm with OTP or transaction will be reversed.
Khalti cashback offer! Get Rs.1000 bonus. Verify account with OTP to receive instant cashback.
Ncell 25th anniversary special. Every 100th customer wins prize. Your number won Rs.50000. Claim fee Rs.3000.
COVID vaccine certificate update required. Visit link and verify with OTP or certificate will be cancelled.
Dubai hotel job vacancy. Salary AED 1500. Visa processing fee Rs.25000. Interview on video call.
Citizens Bank International: Fraudulent activity detected on your account. Immediate OTP verification required.
Your mobile banking app security expired. Update security by entering OTP code sent to your number.
eSewa New Year offer! Double your wallet balance. Send OTP to activate this limited time offer.
Samsung Galaxy S23 won in Facebook contest. Congratulations! Delivery charge Rs.7500 to receive phone.
Your SIM card will be blocked due to Aadhaar not linked. Link now by sharing OTP. Last day today.
Online tutoring job. Teach students from home. Rs.1000 per hour. Background verification fee Rs.3500.
Nepal Investment Bank urgent: Account compromised. Change password by verifying OTP within 1 hour.
